content:
Prosecutors of Cherkasy region provided the arrest of 4 helicopters and 2 aircraft of Crimean entrepreneurs involved in the financing of armed aggression of the Russian Federation.

About thisinformsOffice of the Prosecutor General.

At the request of the prosecutors of the Cherkasy Regional Prosecutor's Office, property belonging to persons related to the financing of Russian armed aggression against Ukraine was arrested. These are 4 aircraft Mi-2 (MII-2) and 2 aircraft An-2 (Antonov-2).

We will remind, in February 2024 reported suspicion of nine Ukrainian entrepreneurs registered in the Autonomous Republic of Crimea. They are engaged in recreational and agro -industrial enterprise.

In the framework of criminal proceedings, it is established that a number of objects of movable property are owned by the founders and final beneficiaries.

In order to block moving assets and prevent them re -registration on false persons to avoid further confiscation of property at the request of the prosecutor, arrest on helicopters and planes owned by the company.

Property and corporate rights of entrepreneurs were also arrested for more than UAH 35 million.

"The suspect was charged with the financing of actions taken to change the boundaries of the territory and the state border of Ukraine for violation of the order established by the Constitution of Ukraine (Part 3 of Article 110-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine),"-said in the department.

The investigation found that after the annexation of the peninsula, these economic entities re -formulated enterprises in accordance with the requirements of the Russian legislation of the Russian Federation. They are currently conducting their business activities with the Russian Federation and paying taxes by financing the aggressor country.

Pre -trial investigation and operational support in criminal proceedings is carried out by the DBR located in the city of Kiev.

As reported by the Armyinform, 12 years in prison is threatened by a collaborator whotried to disrupt the counter -offensive of the Armed Forces in Kharkiv region.

We will remind, in Kiev condemned the seller of street food, whichHe was spyingAccording to the buildings of power structures.
title: In Cherkasy region, 4 helicopters and 2 aircraft of Crimean entrepreneurs were arrested, which funds armed aggression of
description: About it informs the office of the Attorney General. At the request of the prosecutors of Cherkasy ...
author: Army Inform
